alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Geauga; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:58PM EDT until June 16 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Southeastern Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Middlefield, or 10 miles southeast of Chardon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cortland, Middlefield, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Burton, West Farmington, Bristolville, Huntsburg, Claridon, Mecca, Roaming Shores and Aquilla. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
